Title: How Veeam delivers planet-scale semantic search with Azure Cosmos DB | BRK131
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
When building enterprise-grade apps, your database must deliver massive scale and rapid, relevant search. Azure Cosmos DB provides reliable data storage, vector search, and full-text indexing. Explore new capabilities designed to simplify development and enhance AI and search performance. Learn from Azure Cosmos DB engineering team and Veeam on how to optimize any-scale scenarios for efficient and fast search.

Chapters: 0:00 - Introduction to Microsoft DiskANN Vector Index for Semantic Search 00:07:35 - Hyper Scale Vector Search with Azure Cosmos DB Garnet Cache 00:12:06 - Focus on security, scalability, reliability, and regional compliance 00:12:31 - System architecture using Azure Event Hubs, Container Apps, Databricks, and Cosmos DB 00:14:38 - Detailed architecture: event-driven pipeline, data refinement, enrichment, and indexing 00:23:55 - Optimizing Vector Search with Multi-Tenant IO and Shard Keys 00:26:45 - Demo Setup: Veeam Data Cloud Admin Console and Project Atlas 00:31:20 - Semantic Search Demonstration: Finding Contextually Relevant Emails 00:37:03 - Demonstration of hybrid search combining vector and text-based ranking
